tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    treatment_success BOOLEAN,
    nano_technology_application VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE success_rate (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    success BOOLEAN,
    success_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  success_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(100),
  experience_years INT,
  department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_history (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  staff_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(20),
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  success_rate DECIMAL(4, 2),
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    treatment VARCHAR(255)
);
